title: Zetapp
slug: Zetapp - Landing page for a mobile app

title: reBook
slug: reBook - An online store for second hand books.
description: It is a second hand book selling store built with MERN stack, where sellers can sell their old books and buyers can buy them. Admin can manage sellers as well as buyers.

title: Doctors
description: It is a online medical platform built with MERN stack, where users can make an appointment and interact with favourite doctors.
